text.tspan: Draw 1 dot, then a row of 2 dots next to it, and so on...
You draw 1 dot on the first go, 3 on the second, 6 on
How many dots do you draw on the nth go?
How many dots are there in an n√ón square of dots?
Is there a link with the triangle numbers? Why?
Draw a dot then surround it with 6 evenly spaced dots.
Keep adding more layers of dots.
How many dots in the third picture? In the nth?
Is there a link with the triangle or square numbers?
